test_image module¶

test_image.test_b64_to_image(b64_path, expected_path)¶

Test the b64_to_image function

This function ensures that the b64_to_image function correctly converts a base64 string into an image. The converted image is compared to the expected image, which is loaded from a file.

Parameters

  • b64_path (str) – path to txt file with base64 string

  • expected_path (str) – path to expected image file

Returns

none

test_image.test_image_to_b64(img_path, b64_path)¶

Test the image_to_b64 function

This function ensures that the image_to_b64 function correctly convert an image into a base64 string. The converted string is then compared to the expected string, which is loaded from a txt file.

Parameters

  • img_path (str) – path to image

  • b64_path (str) – path to expected base64 string

Returns

none

test_image.test_is_b64(b64_image, expected)¶

Test the is_b64 function

Parameters

b64_image (str) – string in question for b64 validity

Returns

none

test_image.test_read_img_as_b64(file_path, b64_path)¶

The the read_img_as_b64 function

This function ensures that the read_img_as_b64 function converts the image into the correct string. The converted string is compared to the expected string, which is loaded from a text file.

Parameters

  • file_path (str) – path to image file

  • b64_path (str) – path to txt file with expected b64 string

Returns

none

test_image.test_save_b64_img(b64_path, file_path, expected_path)¶

Test the save_b64_img function

This function ensures that the save_b64_img function correctly converts the base64 string into an image. The converted image is compared to the expected image, which is loaded from a file.

Parameters

  • b64_path (str) – path to txt file with expected b64 string

  • file_path (str) – path to image file

  • expected_path (str) – path to expected image file

Returns

none

test_image.test_unzip(filename, expected)¶

Test the unzip function

This function ensures that the unzip function extracts all the images in a zip file.

Parameters

  • filename (str) – file path to zip file

  • expected (dict) – dictionary with expected image list and

  • flag (success) –

Returns

none
